briefdescription.para: Sets or gets the color for the gizmos that will be drawn next.
Sets or gets the matrix used to transform all gizmos.
Begins a draw-guard. If any gizmos are drawn to this drawer an exception will be thrown at the end of the guard.
Ends a draw-guard. If any gizmos were drawn to this drawer during the guard, an exception will be thrown.
Causes all remaining gizmos drawing to be done in the local coordinate space of the given transform.
Saves the current gizmo matrix to the gizmo matrix stack.
Restores the current gizmo matrix from the gizmo matrix stack.
Resets the matrix to the identity matrix and the color to white.
Draw a filled gizmo mesh using the given matrix transform.

memberdef.argsstring: (Mesh mesh, Vector3 position, Quaternion rotation, Vector3 scale)
memberdef.name: DrawMesh

briefdescription.para: Draws a filled gizmo mesh at the given transform location.
Draws a wire gizmo mesh using the given matrix transform.

memberdef.argsstring: (Mesh mesh, Vector3 position, Quaternion rotation, Vector3 scale)
memberdef.name: DrawWireMesh

briefdescription.para: Draws a wire gizmo mesh at the given transform location.
Draws a gizmo line that connects the two positions.
Draws a filled gizmo cube at the given position with the given size.
Draws a wire gizmo cube at the given position with the given size.
Draws a filled gizmo sphere at the given position with the given radius.
Draws a wire gizmo sphere at the given position with the given radius.
Draws a wire ellipsoid gizmo with two specified foci and a specified minor axis length.
Draws a wire gizmo capsule at the given position, with the given start and end points and radius.

memberdef.argsstring: (Vector3 center, Vector3 normal, Vector3 radialStartDirection, float radius, float fractionOfCircleToDraw, int numCircleSegments=16)
memberdef.name: DrawWireArc

memberdef.argsstring: (GameObject gameObject, bool useWireframe=true, bool traverseHierarchy=true, bool drawTriggers=false)
memberdef.name: DrawColliders

memberdef.argsstring: (Vector3 pos, Color lerpColor, float lerpCoeff, float? overrideScale=null)
memberdef.name: DrawPosition

briefdescription.para: Draws a simple XYZ-cross position gizmo at the target position, whose size is scaled relative to the main camera's distance to the target position (for reliable visibility).

detaileddescription.para: Or, if you provide an override scale, you can enforce a radius size for the gizmo.
You can also provide a color argument and lerp coefficient towards that color from the axes' default colors (red, green, blue). Colors are lerped in HSV space.

briefdescription.para: Draws a simple XYZ-cross position gizmo at the target position, whose size is scaled relative to the main camera's distance to the target position (for reliable visibility).

memberdef.argsstring: (Vector3 center, Vector3 normal, float radius, int numCircleSegments=16)
memberdef.name: DrawLineWireCircle

memberdef.argsstring: (Vector3 center, Vector3 normal, Vector3 radialStartDirection, float radius, float fractionOfCircleToDraw, int numCircleSegments=16)
memberdef.name: drawWireArcNow

memberdef.argsstring: (Vector3 position, Vector3 circleNormal, Vector3 radialStartDirection, float radius, Color inFrontOfPlaneColor, Color behindPlaneColor, Vector3 planeNormal, ref int curPass, float fractionOfCircleToDraw=1.0f, int numCircleSegments=16)
memberdef.name: drawPlaneSoftenedWireArcNow

memberdef.argsstring: (ref int currPass, bool isUnlit, Color? desiredCurrColor=null)
memberdef.name: setPass
